Posts.Content: I want for a Mammo on 4/9/12 and was told to come in for spot compression and ultrasound on 4/19/12. Below are the results and I also included Mammogram from 8/2010. Im just wondering if I should go back before 6 months. Thank you in advance Maureen Spot compression and U/S done on 4/19/12 Impression :The study was performed for 2 small 3mm nodular areas noted in the superior aspect of the right breast on the MLO view from the study on 4/9/12. The two small areas are noted on spot compression MLO views. Ultrasound was performed with attention to the 10 o'clock and 2 o'clock positions. Nothing was seen on U/S. Follow up in 6 months BIRADS category 3- probably Benign ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Mammogram dated 8/25/2010 Impression : Bilateral axillary nodular densities are seen with very lucent centers consistent with Lymph nodes. Benign perenchymal calcification are seen. BIRADS category 2 benign study ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Mammogram dated 8/19/2009 Everything was fine.....told to come back in a year.
Posts.Title: Results of spot compression... Should I wait 6 months or go back sooner?
